attributes.action: Re-Legalise Small Firearms and Absolute Protection of the Home
attributes.additional_details:
Discuss/debate in Parliament the pros and cons of possession of small firearms, for the protection of the home. This needs to be done without reactionary reference to individual instances, and take a holistic perspective. This would naturally require a discussion on the extent to which British citizens can legally protect themselves and their homes.

Too long have guns been held in the wrong hands.
